BDL Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for General Manager Post
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 19, 2025, 11:00 IST
 Bharat Dynamics Limited
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 19-Aug-2025 |  Telangana |  Salary : 100,000 to 260,000




FOLLOW

The Bharat Dynamic Limited (BDL) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for General Manager Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering, Electrical Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the BDL Recruitment 2025. Here we mentioned the age limit, selection process, and salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can fill out the application form on or before the last date of application.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more Jobs in Telangana.

BDL Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
General Manager	01	B.E/ B.Tech in Mechanical Engineering, Electrical Engineering

Age Limit for the BDL Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 55 years.

Selection Process for the BDL Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the BDL Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 1,00,000 /- per month.
The Maximum Salary: Rs. 2,60,000 /- per month.

Application fee for the BDL Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the BDL Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the General Manager notification 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form carefully.
Then, send the application form along with the required documents to the address mentioned in the official notification

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	18-08-2025
Last Date of Application	17-09-2025

 

Official Notification and Application Form	Click Here

Join on Telegram	Join Now
